education.degree: Bachelor of Mathematics in Actuarial Science

responsibilities: Analyzed historical claims data to identify trends in mortality and morbidity for life insurance products.
Utilized SQL to extract large datasets for use in GGY AXIS modeling software.
Assisted in the automation of monthly financial reporting processes using Excel VBA, reducing manual processing time by 10 hours.
Perform quarterly reserve valuations for property and casualty lines using the chain-ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methods.
Support the pricing team by conducting sensitivity analyses on proposed rate changes for personal auto policies.
Collaborate with senior actuaries to document methodology changes for IFRS 17 compliance.
